title: Need Help to get out of Bronze
body: guys any tips on how to get out of bronze? my name i s scadoosh12 (ik really funny nme lol!) and yeah help id like. ty guys ily mwah! xoxo :) oh and yeah idk what my paswswordm is any 1 no how 2 get it back?{{champion:79}} ty guys rito is the best! 0294582

replies.body:
Only play the champs you are best with.. If you can't play as them then quit the game and wait until you can.. 
it takes longer but you play less games and you win more
you can start by gitting gud, it's how I git better

Play master yi because people will not get stuns and they will not focus you in team fight, and they will not get a thornmail in Bronze.

Source: did it last year.

- Grind
- Focus on one main role/champ
- Objectives > Kills
- Die less
- Never surrender
- Watch stream/LCS to learn about wave control, correct warding and map rotations.
